title: gcalcli config
description: User configuration for gcalcli command-line tool. See https://pypi.org/project/gcalcli/.

calendars.description: Settings about the set of calendars gcalcli operates on

default-calendars.description: Calendars to use as default for certain commands when no explicit target calendar is otherwise specified

ignore-calendars.description: Calendars to ignore by default (unless explicitly included using --calendar) when running commands against all calendars
